title: Tomato couscous salad
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '425ml chicken stock', '260g couscous', '350g chopped tomato', '15g sliced fresh basil', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil', '40g crumbled feta cheese']
